venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
The film version of "Where The Wild Things Are" opens on October 16. How about a movie meetup on Sunday, October 18? We'll meet for a movie, then dinner/drinks/snacks and discussion afterwards.

I had to change this to an evening show, since I have a late-afternoon conflict. I apologize for changing the meetup time. According to moviefone.com, the movie's at 7:05 PM at Blackstone Cinema 14. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:35 PM.

For information on the film, here's the link to IMDb: http://www.imdb.com/t...
and here's a link to Moviefone: http://www.moviefone....

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Where The Wild Things Are
